snippet.title: Sich Tactics | Battle Gameplay Overview
snippet.description:
The video was recorded specifically for participation in Indie Cup Europe '24

In Sich Tactics you control the party of Cossacks of different classes and fight with enemies on procedurally generated arenas.

Deep turn-based tactics
It is a small game with quick game sessions and deep tactics. One of the key features is the use of verticality to your advantage.

Cossacks of different classes
Each class has unique abilities and plays its role on the battlefield. But the real strength lies in their smart interaction.

More informtaions on Steam:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2064100/Sich_Tactics/

Other our games:
Field hospital: Dr. Taylor's Story
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1315120/Field_Hospital_Dr_Taylors_Story/

Links:
https://twitter.com/GardInteractive

#indie #steam #indiegame #gamedev #ukraine #SichTactics #games #strategy #tactics #українське #ігри  #інді #indiecup
